desc.en: Yuzu puts on a maid outfit to model for a new character in the Game Development Department's latest game. But her lack of self-confidence makes her unsure if she'll be able to be a model. Sensei encourages Yuzu and offers her some advice.
desc.jp: Yuzu puts on a maid outfit to model for a new character in the Game Development Department's latest game. But her lack of self-confidence makes her unsure if she'll be able to be a model. Sensei encourages Yuzu and offers her some advice.
desc.zh_cn: {cf柚子}为了作为新研发游戏的参考而穿上女仆装。但因为天生自信心不足的关系，认为自己不适合当模特儿，显得相当不安。老师鼓舞灰心丧志的{cf柚子}，并且给予了特别的建议。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Sensei is working away in Schale when Yuzu runs in, looking upset. She ran away from the part-time job Sensei helped her get when she realized it was at a maid cafe. To help Yuzu find the courage to face her job, Sensei offers to give her maid lessons.
desc.jp: Sensei is working away in Schale when Yuzu runs in, looking upset. She ran away from the part-time job Sensei helped her get when she realized it was at a maid cafe. To help Yuzu find the courage to face her job, Sensei offers to give her maid lessons.
desc.zh_cn: 在{et夏莱}从容办公的老师。过了一会儿，传来了急促的脚步声，{cf柚子}哭丧着表情来到了{et夏莱}。听过原委后，她明白老师安排的打工是女仆咖啡厅，接着便逃离了咖啡厅。老师为了让{cf柚子}能适应打工环境，于是提议进行女仆特训。

desc.en: Sensei is in the area of Yuzu's maid cafe and goes to check on her at work. Yuzu, nervous about Sensei's visit, makes a series of mistakes which are very unusual for her. When Yuzu doesn't come back after her break, Sensei goes looking for her. However, what they find isn't what they expected.
desc.jp: Sensei is in the area of Yuzu's maid cafe and goes to check on her at work. Yuzu, nervous about Sensei's visit, makes a series of mistakes which are very unusual for her. When Yuzu doesn't come back after her break, Sensei goes looking for her. However, what they find isn't what they expected.
desc.zh_cn: 外勤中的老师为了观察{cf柚子}的状况，于是便前往她打工的女仆咖啡厅。老师的出现让{cf柚子}顿时很紧张，表现失常接二连三发生了失误。稍后。休息时间已经过了，{cf柚子}依旧没有回来，老师基于担心就去找{cf柚子}，因此看见了令人意外的景象。

profile.en:
The president of the Millennium Game Development Department. She began wearing a maid uniform after being mistaken for a C&C member.

The new outfit might not have transformed her into an outgoing extrovert, but it did give her the confidence to leave her room! With scary and unfamiliar events occurring all around her, Yuzu does her best to overcome each obstacle with the Game Development Department's support.
profile.jp:
色々あってメイド服を着ることになったミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、ゲーム開発部の部長。

普段と違う格好でもユズはユズのままではあるが、少しだけできる事が広がった模様。ゲーム開発部のみんなと一緒に、様々な困難に立ち向かうことに。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
千年科学学园所属，发生种种事情而换上了女仆装的「游戏开发部」部长。

穿上了和平时不同的服装也还是原来的柚子没变，但好像能做到的事比以前更多了。
与游戏开发部的大家一起直面各种困难。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
因为各种原因穿上女仆装的千年科学学园所属，游戏开发部的部长。

就算服装与平时不同，柚子依然还是柚子，不过能做的事似乎变多了。决定和游戏开发部的大家一起面对各式各样的困难。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
千年科学学园所属，发生种种事情而换上了女仆装的「游戏开发部」部长。

穿上了和平时不同的服装也还是原来的柚子没变，但好像能做到的事比以前更多了。
与游戏开发部的大家一起直面各种困难。

intro.en: It's me, Hanaoka Yuzu... Um, I look a little different right now because of...a few reasons. Thanks for your help...
intro.jp:
花岡ユズ……です。
色々あって……今はこの格好をしています。
よろしく、お願いします……
intro.zh_cn_jp:
花岡ユズ……です。
色々あって……今はこの格好をしています。
よろしく、お願いします……
intro.zh_cn_tw:
我是花冈柚子……
因为各种原因……所以现在打扮成这样。
还请，多多指教……

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.jp: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}在游戏中心收到了「打扫」的委托。委托人将{cf桃井}误认为{cnC&C}的{cf宁瑠}──没注意到这点就接下委托的{cf桃井}和{cn游戏开发部}一行人决定换上女仆装扮演{cnC&C}。究竟一行人能否顺利达成委托呢？

desc.en: The members of the Game Development Department start by deciphering the Calling Cards in order to stop the Benevolent Thief, who steals the the things that they've marked without fail. With Yuzu's help, they succeed in unlocking the secret of the Calling Card.
desc.jp: The members of the Game Development Department start by deciphering the Calling Cards in order to stop the Benevolent Thief, who steals the the things that they've marked without fail. With Yuzu's help, they succeed in unlocking the secret of the Calling Card.
desc.zh_cn: 为了竭尽所能阻止预告的物品被「慈爱的怪盗」窃取，{cn游戏开发部}一行人决定先开始解读预告函。多亏{cf柚子}的活跃表现，成功解开预告函的秘密了。

desc.en: The Game Development Department members are working as maids for the mansion as well as bodyguards. They struggle with their unfamiliar duties, but are helped by Toki, who suddenly shows up dressed as a bunny girl. The members and Sensei are surprised by Toki's sudden appearance. Before they have a chance to greet each other, Benevolent Thief appears in the middle of the party.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department members are working as maids for the mansion as well as bodyguards. They struggle with their unfamiliar duties, but are helped by Toki, who suddenly shows up dressed as a bunny girl. The members and Sensei are surprised by Toki's sudden appearance. Before they have a chance to greet each other, Benevolent Thief appears in the middle of the party.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}一行人负责护卫任务与宅邸内的仆人工作。因为不熟悉任务内容的关系，让一行人陷入了苦战，但穿着兔女郎服装的{cf季}突然现身伸出援手。{cf季}突如其来的登场，让{cn游戏开发部}一行人和老师全都相当讶异。彼此连打招呼的时间都没有，慈爱的怪盗就突然现身在派对上了。

desc.en: Toki and the rest of the Game Development Department face off against Benevolent Thief. When Midori falls down the stairs, Benevolent Thief saves her and disappears, leaving behind a mysterious comment. Toki reveals that she was sent here on a mission by C&C and agrees to work with the Game Development Department.
desc.jp: Toki and the rest of the Game Development Department face off against Benevolent Thief. When Midori falls down the stairs, Benevolent Thief saves her and disappears, leaving behind a mysterious comment. Toki reveals that she was sent here on a mission by C&C and agrees to work with the Game Development Department.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}一行人与{cf季}围攻慈爱的怪盗。{cf绿}不幸从阶梯上掉下来，慈爱的怪盗伸出援手救了她，说了一句意味深长的话后便消失不见。{cf季}说自己是因为{cnC&C}的任务才会潜入此地，后来决定和{cn游戏开发部}一起行动。

desc.en: Guests observe the artworks up for auction. Suddenly, the lights go out, putting the Game Development Department on alert. Then, a mysterious voice is heard on a communication orb that has rolled towards Sensei, and Sensei becomes suspicious of the events taking place in the mansion and calls everyone in...
desc.jp: Guests observe the artworks up for auction. Suddenly, the lights go out, putting the Game Development Department on alert. Then, a mysterious voice is heard on a communication orb that has rolled towards Sensei, and Sensei becomes suspicious of the events taking place in the mansion and calls everyone in...
desc.zh_cn: 嘉宾们都在观赏拍卖的艺术品。照明突然关闭，{cn游戏开发部}进入戒备状态。当时老师从通信珠中听见了可疑的声音，和可疑的声音交谈的老师开始对老宅邸发生的事件产生疑问，并且召集了大家……

desc.en: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.jp: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}在游戏中心收到了「打扫」的委托。委托人将{cf桃井}误认为{cnC&C}的{cf宁瑠}──没注意到这点就接下委托的{cf桃井}和{cn游戏开发部}一行人决定换上女仆装扮演{cnC&C}。究竟一行人能否顺利达成委托呢？

desc.en: After being outmaneuvered by Meitaro's last resort, the Game Development Department members manage to escape thanks to a smoke screen that bursts from somewhere. When they reach the forest, they are approached by an unexpected visitor, the Benevolent Thief. The Benevolent Thief begins to tell them about Meitaro's secret...
desc.jp: After being outmaneuvered by Meitaro's last resort, the Game Development Department members manage to escape thanks to a smoke screen that bursts from somewhere. When they reach the forest, they are approached by an unexpected visitor, the Benevolent Thief. The Benevolent Thief begins to tell them about Meitaro's secret...
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}被明太郎逼得无路可退，所幸从某处冒出了烟雾弹，一行人才得以顺利逃脱。抵达森林后，一行人遇见了出乎预料的访客慈爱的怪盗。慈爱的怪盗开始谈论明太郎的秘密……

desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}和{cf季}击倒慈爱的怪盗且守住了王冠，但眼前突然出现了烟雾弹，慈爱的怪盗也伺机隐藏了踪迹。另一方面，明太郎离开老宅邸企图逃跑，意想不到的帮手登场后，让他陷入昏厥状态。

desc.zh_cn: 意想不到的帮手就是{cnC&C}的成员们。一行人虽然害怕被{cf宁瑠}斥责，但{cf宁瑠}反而称赞一行人表现得很好。同一时间，晶回想老师说过的话，独自沉浸在感伤当中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
